title: 2 Simple Ways to Log Out of Your Instagram Account

steps.title: Go to your Instagram profile.
steps.content: Go to your Instagram profile. If you're not already there, tap your profile photo at the bottom-right corner of the Instagram app to go there now. You can find this in the bottom-right corner. If you don't have one, it will look like a person icon. If you have multiple accounts logged in at once, make sure you're currently on the account you want to log out with. To switch accounts, tap the current username at the top-left corner, and then select the other account from the pop-up menu. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the menu in the top-right corner ☰.
steps.content: Tap the menu in the top-right corner ☰ . A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Log out.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Log out . This is at the very bottom of the page in red.

steps.title: Tap Log out again.
steps.content: Tap Log out again. You may be asked to save your login info for your Instagram account. This will make it easier to log into your account on the same device. If you don't want this saved, tap Not Now . Otherwise, tap Save . [2] X Research source To log out of other devices , go to Settings and privacy → Accounts Center → Password and security → Where you're logged in → tap your account → Select devices to log out .

steps.title: Delete saved login information (optional).
steps.content: Delete saved login information (optional). Instagram may save your login information using your device's password manager. If needed, you can delete this from your device. On the login screen, tap the gear icon at the top-right. Select the account and tap Remove account . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click the menu icon on Instagram ☰.
steps.content: Click the menu icon on Instagram ☰ . This will be at the bottom-left corner of the page when you're logged in to Instagram in your web browser. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Click Log out.
steps.content: Click Log out . This is the option at the very bottom. You'll be logged out of Instagram. If you're worried about Instagram saving your login credentials, you can clear your browsing history and delete saved passwords . To log out of other devices, go to Settings→ Accounts Center → Password and security → Where you're logged in → click your account → Select devices to log out .
